title: Reality's Very Real Probably Cognitohazardous Art Page
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

++ About Me
@@@@
Heyo I am [[*user IAmReal]][[footnote]]God that's confusing[[/footnote]] AKA Reality and this is my art page. I am a highschool student currently living in Australia although I'm English/Irish by nationality. For me right now art is just a hobby but I hope to go to art college in the future. I love experimenting with different techniques and styles so my art is constantly evolving and changing. I have two cats and a dog along with two younger brothers, I love video games, especially Pokemon and am a real sucker for deep lore on the wiki. I usually use GIMP to draw but sometimes I use MS Paint to do silly doodles. Eyes are my aesthetic. I also go by any pronouns. If you want to see more check out my [*https://iamreal44.tumblr.com/ Tumblr]. Anyway...
@@@@
Wow, it's been a while. As I type this it is 5 in the morning the 18th of August 2024. Graduated High School two years ago and currently pursuing my dreams as an animation student majoring in art direction. I lost one of my cats[[footnote]]The one pictured at the bottom of the page[[/footnote]],Paw Paw, to cancer a couple of months ago, my other cat Bilby and my dog Emmet are still doing well though. Nowadays I'm more into Doctor Who/Faction Paradox, Star Wars, Death Note[[footnote]]The movies not the anime and I am not talking about the Netflix one[[/footnote]] and Yu-Gi-Oh. I found myself having to take a break from the SCP community not long after this art page was first made due to drama surrounding people in the community who I looked up to and saw as my friends. I always planned to come back and finish writing my SCP I got greenlit but I guess I never did. I might come back to the site properly one day, but for now it is goodbye. I will always hold this community close to my heart. The stories here shaped my love of Sci-Fi/Fantasy, and the site gave me a way to express my cringe ass writing to others, even if I never posted it. I especially want to thank everybody on this site and on IRC who ever interacted with me, thank you for putting up with my 15 year old self. 
@@@@
And that's where I'll leave you for now. Thanks again for welcoming me to this community, even if I never really left much of a mark nor gave any goodbyes. If you want to see how my art has progressed my Tumblr is now [*https://https://osfinexe.tumblr.com// Osfinexe]  
@@@@
Bye for now -Reality AKA Osfin AKA Polly
